doc.title: ieat's Prata Workshop: The flips and the flops!
doc.text: We/PRP had/VBD a/DT great/JJ workshop/NN last/JJ Saturday/NN ./. Over/DT 30/CD participants/NNS turned/VBD up/RP to/TO learn/VB how/RB to/TO make/VB Roti/NN Prata/NN and/CC we/PRP must/VB have/VB made/VBD more/JJR than/IN 20/CD different/JJ types/NN of/IN pratas/NN ranging/VBG from/IN kosong/NN to/TO Luncheon/NNP Meat/NNP to/TO chicken/NN chop/NN and/CC cheese/NN ./. The/DT one/CD that/WDT really/RB stood/VBN out/IN was/VBD the/DT Japanese/NN Prata/NN ,/, which/WDT might/VB just/RB be/VB a/DT world/NN 's/POS first/JJ ./. Everyone/PRP was/VBD raving/VBG about/IN it/PRP at/IN the/DT end/NN of/IN the/DT session/NN !/. Thanks/JJ to/TO everyone/VB for/IN coming/NN to/TO the/DT session/NN and/CC really/RB getting/VBG into/IN it/PRP !/. Special/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO Champagne/NN ,/, Joao/NN and/CC Soundman/NN for/IN helping/NN me/PRP organize/VBD the/DT session/NN ./. This/DT session/NN was/VBD made/VBD possible/JJ through/IN the/DT sponsorship/NN of/IN Mayer/NN Live/NN Kitchen/NN who/WP have/VBZ allowed/VBN us/PRP the/DT use/VB of/IN their/PRP$ beautiful/NN showroom/NN at/IN Great/NNP World/NNP City/NNP ./. Mayer/DT is/VBZ the/DT distributor/NN for/IN CuisinArt/NN and/CC KitchenAid/NN ,/, both/DT very/RB solid/JJ machines/NN which/WDT I/PRP rely/VBD on/IN in/IN my/PRP$ kitchen/NN experiments/NN ./. Ieatishootipost/JJ readers/NNS can/MD buy/VB Mayer/JJ products/NN at/IN a/DT very/RB special/JJ discounted/NN rate/NN ./. What/WP you/PRP need/VBP to/TO do/VB is/VBZ to/TO write/VB to/TO to/TO get/VB a/DT quote/NN for/IN any/DT of/IN the/DT appliances/NN in/IN their/PRP$ product/NN range/NN !/. You/PRP can/MD have/VB a/DT look/VB at/IN their/PRP$ brochure/NN at/IN www.mayer.com.sg/NN ./.
